clauses_related_to_safe.equity_financing: Automatic conversion into Safe Preferred Stock shares equal to Purchase Amount divided by Conversion Price upon Equity Financing
clauses_related_to_safe.liquidity_event: Entitled to receive greater of Cash-Out Amount or Conversion Amount in a Liquidity Event
clauses_related_to_safe.dissolution_event: Entitled to receive Cash-Out Amount in a Dissolution Event
clauses_related_to_safe.liquidation_priority: Junior to indebtedness and creditor claims, on par with Preferred Stock, senior to Common Stock, junior to other SAFEs with greater or equal Purchase Amount

conversion_mechanics.conversion_price: Either Safe Price or Discount Price, whichever results in greater number of shares
conversion_mechanics.safe_price: Valuation Cap divided by Company Capitalization
conversion_mechanics.discount_price: Standard Preferred Stock price multiplied by Discount Rate (78%)

company_representations: Duly organized DE corporation in good standing
Has power and authority to execute SAFE
SAFE constitutes legal, valid and binding obligation
Performance does not violate material judgments, statutes, or regulations
